cast.overview: New York photographer Ronit flies to London after learning about the death of her estranged father. Ronit is returning to the same Orthodox Jewish community that shunned her decades earlier for her childhood attraction to Esti, a female friend. Their fortuitous and happy reunion soon reignites their burning passion as the two women explore the boundaries of faith and sexuality.
cast.title: Disobedience

cast.overview: Paddington, now happily settled with the Browns, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy, but it is stolen.
cast.title: Paddington 2

details.biography:
David Sullivan is a British actor known for De De Pyaar De (2019), Sharknado 5: Global Swarming (2017) and The Hippopotamus (2017).

David is also a published author with his internationally published autobiography Progress of a Modern Pilgrim (Malcolm Down Publishing - U.K. and Anchor / Doubleday - U.S.).
details.name: David Sullivan
